function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low brand awareness leading to low consumer recognition and recall","Impact":"Reduced customer-based brand equity and competitive disadvantage","Mitigation":"Invest in brand awareness campaigns and marketing strategies to increase visibility and recognition","Technologies":"Digital marketing, social media advertising, influencer partnerships","People":"Marketers, advertising agencies, brand managers","Owner":"Companies, marketing departments"},{"Description":"Failure to differentiate brand associations from competitors","Impact":"Decreased brand equity and competition from similar brands","Mitigation":"Develop unique and favorable brand associations through product differentiation and advertising messaging","Technologies":"Market research, customer feedback systems, targeted advertising","People":"Brand managers, advertising creatives, product development teams","Owner":"Companies, marketing departments"}]}
